artist: Engraver: J. H. Young; Publisher: Charles Desilver
description: map of Minnesota with surrounding areas to west and east; counties hand-colored in light red, yellow, green and blue; "Proposed Dakota Territory" colored in green; red border around Minnesota
inscription:
Inscription

LRC along right edge, in pencil: [0823 / 1858]
provenance: [W. Graham Arader III, Philadelphia, until 2005; sold in October for NOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d.2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Map of Minnesota
